snippet: Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif has often criticized the United States’ use of unmanned aircraft against militants.
abstract: American drone strike kills at least seven people in Pakistan as new Prime Min Nawaz Sharif announces his cabinet.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif has often criticized the United States’ use of unmanned aircraft against militants.

headline.seo: U.S. Drone Strikes Pakistan as Sharif Names Cabinet
headline.main: U.S. Drone Strike Kills at Least 7 in Pakistan as New Prime Minister Announces Cabinet
headline.print_headline: U.S. Drone Strike Kills at Least 7 in Pakistan as New Prime Minister Announces Cabinet
